header.tagline: Full Stack Developer | Cybersecurity Analyst | Cloud Architect
header.bio: I am a Full Stack Developer who combines strong architectural skills with a dedicated focus on cybersecurity and cloud infrastructure. With experience in both high-speed financial trading systems and modern e-commerce platforms, I focus on writing clean, production-ready code. I bring a security-first approach to development, ensuring that scalability and performance are built in from day one.

freelance.title: Open to Opportunities
freelance.text: I am currently exploring Full-Time Engineering roles and specialized Freelance contracts. If you need a secure, scalable architecture, let's talk.

experience.description: I served as the lead developer for a custom e-commerce platform, overseeing the entire stack from database design to the user interface. My main focus was building a robust payment system using Stripe webhooks to handle real-time transactions securely. I also designed a normalized SQL schema to manage complex B2B inventory data, ensuring fast query performance as the catalog grew. By implementing a reactive frontend, I improved the user experience, making product discovery and checkout seamless. This project sharpened my ability to deliver a production-ready system under tight deadlines.

Completed a competitive 25-week fellowship focused on Enterprise Security Operations, I engaged in a rigorous, case-based curriculum designed to solve actual business problems rather than just covering theory. I utilized industry-standard frameworks to detect Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) and executed Incident Response playbooks to neutralize simulated threat actors efficiently. My training extended to security architecture, where I designed defense-in-depth strategies involving Identity Access Management (IAM) and data protection protocols. Additionally, I aligned technical security controls with broader business objectives using Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) frameworks to minimize organizational liability.

I contributed to the development of India's leading algorithmic trading platform, specifically focusing on the high-performance Copy Trading engine. My work involved optimizing the low-latency execution logic required to replicate trades instantly across Master and Child accounts, ensuring minimal slippage for users managing multiple Demat profiles. The backend systems I assisted in building now power the trading infrastructure for over six major financial organizations and execute more than 250 automated strategies daily. By helping design a scalable architecture capable of handling high-volume traffic, I supported a platform that serves over 100 enterprise clients with robust, error-free automation.

I engineered responsive, high-traffic web interfaces for major educational and wellness ventures, utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP to ensure seamless cross-device compatibility. I played a key role in developing critical platforms like the RKU Admissions portal and The Northstar School website, which collectively serve thousands of students and applicants daily. I built backend modules for the NorthStar student platform using ASP.NET, ensuring secure, high-performance data access for end users. Beyond the education sector, I contributed to the digital presence of Raga Svara, a luxury wellness venture, by implementing complex layouts and an integrated online booking system. Throughout these projects, I collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to translate conceptual wireframes into pixel-perfect code while employing Git for rigorous version control and efficient team workflow.

education.description: A high-intensity program focused on Enterprise Architecture and IT Governance. I specialized in bridging the gap between business requirements and technical implementation. I gained advanced proficiency in Cloud Solutions Administration, designing scalable infrastructure that aligns with IT Service Management (ITIL) standards. The program culminated in a rigorous Capstone project where I architected a compliant Enterprise Content Management system from scratch, integrating strict user access controls, data flow automation, and secure cloud storage protocols.

A comprehensive 4-year engineering degree rooted in the fundamentals of Computer Science and SDLC. The curriculum was heavily integrated with industry standards, featuring direct coursework partnerships with IBM and CISCO. My final year was dedicated entirely to an Industrial Project, where I transitioned from classroom theory to professional software delivery within an IT firm. I mastered core competencies in Algorithms, System Software, and Big Data Analytics, conducting research that I presented at national-level technical symposiums.

projects.title: DocuVault Ecosystem
projects.summary: A cross-platform document management SaaS connecting web dashboards to mobile clients.
projects.details: I developed this ecosystem to solve the mess of manual document exchange between professionals and their clients. It is a dual-platform SaaS that pairs a React.js web dashboard for organizations with a React Native mobile app for end-users. The goal was to make file sharing instant and secure, so I helped build a Python Django backend that handles the heavy liftingâ€”storage, user management, and 256-bit encryption. On the frontend, I designed the workflow so that as soon as an admin uploads a file, the client gets a mobile notification to view or sign it immediately. It supports multi-tenancy as well, meaning a single user can easily switch between different business profiles without logging in and out.

projects.title: AlgoDelta Copy Trading
projects.summary: High-frequency trade replication engine integrating 25+ brokerage APIs.
projects.details: I contributed to the core engineering of India's premier Copy Trading solution, which enables the instant replication of trades from a Master account to thousands of Child accounts. Built on a robust Python Django architecture, the system handles the complex 'Master-Child' logic across over 25 different broker APIs, ensuring low-latency execution regardless of the platform. On the frontend, I utilized React.js to construct the 'Smart Dashboard,' a real-time command center that syncs Live P&L and open positions without requiring page reloads. This platform is currently the backbone for 13+ financial organizations, processing automated strategies with enterprise-grade security and precision.

projects.title: IoT Based Smart Garbage Monitoring System
projects.summary: Smart India Hackathon Finalist: A real-time waste logistics network.
projects.details: I developed this end-to-end IoT solution as a finalist entry for the Smart India Hackathon to modernize municipal waste logistics. The core system uses ESP32 microcontrollers with ultrasonic sensors to track garbage levels in real-time, which I programmed using C++ to transmit data instantly to a Firebase cloud backend. This live data feeds into a React.js dashboard allowing city officials to monitor bin status (Green/Orange/Red) and deploy trucks only when necessary, effectively cutting down manual inspections. I also engineered a hardware automation feature using servo motors that automatically opens the bin lid when a user approaches, ensuring a completely contactless and hygienic experience.

projects.title: Orange Blossom Storefront
projects.summary: A lightweight, custom e-commerce engine built without CMS bloat.
projects.details: I built this because the client needed a fast online shop but didn't want the heavy monthly costs of Shopify or the mess of WordPress. I used simple PHP and JavaScript to make a custom shopping cart. The biggest challenge was payments, I didn't want orders to get lost if a customer closed their browser too fast. So, I set up a 'Webhook' listener that talks directly to Stripe in the background to confirm every payment 100%. I also wrote the backend logic to handle all the tricky math, automatically calculating Ontario tax and shipping rules based on where the customer lives.
